Key Match Events: The Guardians scored five runs without an out in the first inning
Lane Thomas hit the first pitch of his postseason career for a three-run homer
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt expressed that the win was a huge game for the Guardians' players
A.J. Hinch acknowledged that the Tigers struggled to overcome the early lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians earned a bye to reach the ALDS by finishing with the second best record in the league
The Guardians' bullpen, considered the best in the big leagues, hadn't pitched in six days
Others: Cade Smith struck out four straight batters after replacing Bibee in the fifth inning
Emmanuel Clase retired the Tigers in order to complete the four-hit shutout
